Self.description: A ressource with this permissions can only be seen by the creator. The word 'self'.

Guild.description: A ressource with this permissions can only be seen by members of the guild. The word 'guild'.

Global.description: A ressource with this permissions can be seen by everyone. The word 'global'.

None.description: No action is performed. The word 'none'.

ContentDeleted.description: The message is deleted. The word 'content deleted'.

CaseCreated.description: A case is created. The word 'case created'.

ContentDeletedAndCaseCreated.description: The message is deleted and a case is created. The word 'content deleted and case created'.

InvitePosted.description: A message with an invite link is posted. The word 'invite posted'.

TooManyEmotes.description: A message with too many emotes is posted. The word 'too many emotes'.

TooManyMentions.description: A message with too many mentions is posted. The word 'too many mentions'.

TooManyAttachments.description: A message with too many attachments is posted. The word 'too many attachments'.

TooManyEmbeds.description: A message with too many embeds is posted. The word 'too many embeds'.

TooManyAutoModerations.description: A user triggered too many automoderations. The word 'too many auto-moderations'.

CustomWordFilter.description: A message with a custom word is posted. The word 'custom word'.

TooManyMessages.description: A user posted too many messages. The word 'too many messages'.
